### canonicalizeMetadataForValue() {#a20a678afa540694502fca3ed77617af8}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static Metadata &#42; canonicalizeMetadataForValue (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llvmcontext">LLVMContext</a> &amp; Context, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/metadata">Metadata</a> &#42; MD)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Canonicalize metadata arguments to intrinsics.

To support bitcode upgrades (and assembly semantic sugar) for <em><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/metadataasvalue">MetadataAsValue</a></em>, we need to canonicalize certain metadata.


<ul>
<li>nullptr is replaced by an empty <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdnode">MDNode</a>.</li>
<li>An <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdnode">MDNode</a> with a single null operand is replaced by an empty <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdnode">MDNode</a>.</li>
<li>An <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdnode">MDNode</a> whose only operand is a <em><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantasmetadata">ConstantAsMetadata</a></em> gets skipped.</li>
</ul>


This maintains readability of bitcode from when metadata was a type of value, and these bridges were unnecessary.

Definition at line <a href="#l00081">81</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/metadata-cpp">Metadata.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getOrSelfReference() {#ac03fb37174ccf690b0e7e675b47fcb19}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static MDNode &#42; getOrSelfReference (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llvmcontext">LLVMContext</a> &amp; Context, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/metadata">Metadata</a> &#42; &gt; Ops)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Get a node or a self-reference that looks like it.

Special handling for finding self-references, for use by <em><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdnode/#a3279d6d110c594673e692308fce00fab">MDNode::concatenate()</a></em> and <em><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdnode/#acdbfda46c9837123ef7143244fc1f904">MDNode::intersect()</a></em> to maintain behaviour from when self-referencing nodes were still uniqued. If the first operand has the same operands as <code>Ops</code>, return the first operand instead.

Definition at line <a href="#l01100">1100</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/metadata-cpp">Metadata.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

<Link id="l01284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1284" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdnode/#aac6e3a0dec40a6721857cbbd4330039f"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdnode/#aa62a8f06c7c38176942b29855f33ddbc">MDNode</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdnode/#aac6e3a0dec40a6721857cbbd4330039f">MDNode::getMostGenericRange</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdnode/#aa62a8f06c7c38176942b29855f33ddbc">MDNode</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdnode/#aa62a8f06c7c38176942b29855f33ddbc">MDNode</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1285"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Given two ranges, we want to compute the union of the ranges. This</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1286"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is slightly complicated by having to combine the intervals and merge</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1287"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the ones that overlap.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1288"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1289"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a> || !<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1290"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1291"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1292"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a> == <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1293"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1294"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1295"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// First, walk both lists in order of the lower boundary of each interval.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1296"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// At each step, try to merge the new interval to the last one we added.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1297"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;ConstantInt &#42;, 4&gt;</a> EndPoints;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1298"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AI = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1299"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BI = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1300"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AN = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>-&gt;getNumOperands() / 2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1301"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BN = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>-&gt;getNumOperands() / 2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1302"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (AI &lt; AN &amp;&amp; BI &lt; BN) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1303"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantint">ConstantInt</a> &#42;ALow = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/mdconst/#ad938857d6c6603847adf3a8cbe403d17">mdconst::extract&lt;ConstantInt&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>-&gt;getOperand(2 &#42; AI));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1304"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantint">ConstantInt</a> &#42;BLow = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/mdconst/#ad938857d6c6603847adf3a8cbe403d17">mdconst::extract&lt;ConstantInt&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>-&gt;getOperand(2 &#42; BI));</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1309"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ++AI;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1332"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantint">ConstantInt</a> &#42;FB = EndPoints&#91;0&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
